__e: Don't you think what you both need most is a good night's sleep?
But I thought you needed help.
I know you think everything's going to work out, but I don't.
And that right now we needed all the luck we could get.
Good news is if they had what they needed we'd be having this conversation through glass.
Yeah, but that would mean we would have to go to the Book, which is in the kitchen and which entails us going downstairs away from the crystals, which means the demon could slice and dice us.
You know if you ever needed help... you just need to call me, right?
I don't know why they singled me out, but it's like people don't need me.
No, what you need now is either a king and a deuce, except at night, of course, when you'd need a queen and a four.
It'll take you a half-hour to get here.
Well, they called and said they needed proctors.
We have some paperwork we need you to sign but take your time, there's no rush.
- That's right. If we have the means to help the sick and we don't, we better have a damn good reason.
We had a wreck. All we want is a ride.
I don't know. They said they needed a guy like you and a guy like me.
If you think you need more experience to get stars on your helmet... let me tell you something, son:
We can't. We'd need more of his blood. We have none.
Uh, we do have a little bit of water, but we sure could use some more.
